00009 void ORCTITempDecoder::Dump(UInt_t* record)
00010 {
00011   ORLog(kDebug) << "*************** Dumping out CTITemp Data *************" << std::endl;
00012   ORLog(kDebug) << "Device ID: " << GetDeviceID(record) << std::endl
00013     << " Temperature: " << GetTemperature(record) << std::endl
00014     << " Time: " << GetTime(record) << std::endl;
00015   ORLog(kDebug) << "********************************************************" << std::endl;
00016 }
00017 
00018 std::string ORCTITempDecoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00019 {
00020   switch(iPar) {
00021     case 0:
00022       return "Device ID";
00023     case 1:
00024       return "Temperature";
00025     case 2:
00026       return "Time";
00027   }
00028   ORLog(kError) << "Parameter number out of bounds" << std::endl;
00029   return "";
00030 }
00031 
00032 UInt_t ORCTITempDecoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/)
00033 {
00034   switch (iPar) {
00035     case 0:
00036       return GetDeviceID(record);
00037     case 1:
00038       return (UInt_t)GetTemperature(record);
00039     case 2:
00040       return GetTime(record);
00041   }
00042   ORLog(kError) << "Parameter number out of bounds" << std::endl;
00043   return 0;
00044 }
